review: Very easy to set up.  Took about 10 minutes.  Only issue is some of the newer movies cost more than expected.  No other problems since installed.
author: KCat

review: We Love the fire stick! We watch it at home and my husband travels so he is able to take it on the road to use in hotels as well. Very easy to operate! My 5 year old can use it better than I can!
author: Lacie

review: Great product; really adds to our viewing, and listening options.
author: Jon B.

review: Works great really like CC option
author: JP

review: My family loved the first one so much I had to buy another one.  It's used all the time, everyone really enjoys using it.
author: Magoo

review: I plan to use it for travel when staying places with wifi.
author: Susan Starr "Cat lover"
